title: Do not ignore timezone differences
summary: We scheduled daily standups without considering team spread across 3 continents, leading to poor participation.

incident.what_happened: Team members missed meetings due to inconvenient times.
incident.root_cause: No attention paid to distributed team timezone needs.

impact.description: Lost collaboration efficiency and slowed decisions.

guidance.do_not_do: Do not schedule core ceremonies in one timezone only.
guidance.do_instead: Set up rotating meeting times or async standups with tools.
